		}
		else {
			return false;

			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {

            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }

<script async="" data-chunk="SearchFeedback" src="//static-assets-web.flixcart.com/fk-p-linchpin-web/fk-cp-zion/js/SearchFeedback.chunk.fe89a747.js"></script><script nonce="16956471799245962708">window.omniture={tpv:[],tl:[]};window.omniture.trackPageView=function(){window.omniture.tpv.push(arguments)};window.omniture.trackLink=function(){window.omniture.tl.push(arguments)}

    if(window.location.host === 'www.flipkart.com' || /\.store\.flipkart\.com/i.test(window.location.host)){
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd"; //omniture account id
    }else{
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd-test";
    }
    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="16956471799245962708">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="3971591153780113003">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="3971591153780113003" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="3971591153780113003">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="3971591153780113003" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html><!DOCTYPE html>

		else {

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {

			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

<script async="" data-chunk="NavMenu" src="//static-assets-web.flixcart.com/fk-p-linchpin-web/fk-cp-zion/js/NavMenu.chunk.c13ed114.js"></script><script nonce="873256330214398151">window.omniture={tpv:[],tl:[]};window.omniture.trackPageView=function(){window.omniture.tpv.push(arguments)};window.omniture.trackLink=function(){window.omniture.tl.push(arguments)}

    if(window.location.host === 'www.flipkart.com' || /\.store\.flipkart\.com/i.test(window.location.host)){
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd"; //omniture account id
    }else{
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd-test";
    }
    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="873256330214398151">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="873256330214398151" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="873256330214398151">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="873256330214398151" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html><!DOCTYPE html>

		}
		else {
			return false;

			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;

		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');

						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;

					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);

			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});

            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();

		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

    if(window.location.host === 'www.flipkart.com' || /\.store\.flipkart\.com/i.test(window.location.host)){
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd"; //omniture account id
    }else{
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd-test";
    }
    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="4328047298937573408">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });

    if(window.location.host === 'www.flipkart.com' || /\.store\.flipkart\.com/i.test(window.location.host)){
        window.s_account = "flipkart-prd"; //omniture account id

    window.s_isDesktop = true;</script><script nonce="9405928558827704174">function isMobile(){
		if (!!(navigator.userAgentData && navigator.userAgentData.mobile) || navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Mobile") !== -1){
			return true;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	}

	if ('serviceWorker' in navigator && !isMobile()) {
		navigator.serviceWorker.register('/sw.js').then(function(registration) {
			console.log('ServiceWorker registration successful with scope: ', registration.scope);
			navigator.onLine && navigator.serviceWorker.controller && navigator.serviceWorker.controller.postMessage('BANDWIDTH_COMPUTE');
			navigator.serviceWorker.addEventListener('message', function (event) {
				try {
					const bandwidthData = JSON.parse(event.data);
					if (bandwidthData && bandwidthData.data) {
						window.bandwidth = bandwidthData.data.downlink + '_' + bandwidthData.data.computeMethod + '_' + bandwidthData.data.effectiveType + '_' + bandwidthData.data.type;
					}
				}catch(err) {
					console.error('JSON.parse failed:', err);
				}
			});
		})
		.catch(function(err) {
			console.error('ServiceWorker registration failed: ', err);
		});
	} else if('serviceWorker' in navigator && isMobile()){
        navigator.serviceWorker.getRegistration().then(function(registration) {
            var serviceWorkerUnregistered=false;
            if(registration) {
                registration.unregister();
                serviceWorkerUnregistered=true;
            }
            serviceWorkerUnregistered && window.location.reload();
        });
    }</script> <script async="" defer="defer" id="omni_script" nonce="9405928558827704174" src="///www/linchpin/batman-returns/omni/omni16.js"></script> <script nonce="9405928558827704174">window._pxAppId = 'PXgNtTli3A';</script><script async="" nonce="9405928558827704174" src="///px/gNtTli3A/init.js"></script></body></html>
